name: Schema 2021 Name Badge - Firlita Adzani
description: Hi! I'm Firlita, and I'm from Indonesia. I'm currently working as UI/UX Designer and it has been only 4 months long lol. This is my very first to join the biggest design system community event called Schema 2021 run by Figma. I'm soooo excited to meet awesome speakers also new friends. Can't wait to hear and receive some new insightful informations about Design System and many more! <33
